snippet: The American Suzuki Motor Corporation filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection and said it would cease selling automobiles in the United States.
abstract: American Suzuki Motor Corporation files for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection and says it will cease selling automobiles in the United States.
lead_paragraph: The American Suzuki Motor Corporation filed for Chapter 11 bankruptcy protection and said it would cease selling automobiles in the United States.

headline.seo: American Suzuki Files for Bankruptcy and Will Exit Car Business
